properties.description: Our Warm Space Community Hub is a welcoming, safe, and inclusive environment designed to support individuals and families during the cost-of-living crisis. Open to all, it offers a heated space, free refreshments including tea, coffee, toast, cakes, etc, and access to resources for local housing support, mental well-being, and local services. The hub fosters connection through social activities, workshops, and a listening ear, ensuring visitors feel valued and supported. By collaborating with local partners and volunteers, we strive to turn isolation into community, providing practical assistance and a warm respite from financial and emotional challenges.
properties.title: BSN Community Hub
